titles.title: Early Voting Act
Early Voting Act
A bill to amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to establish minimum requirements for early voting.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Early Voting Act
This bill requires states and jurisdictions that administer elections to offer early voting. The bill provides for the minimum required number of early voting locations, the length of the early voting period, and other requirements.
